attributes.action: Lobby the government re dog and cat thefts in Scotland.
attributes.background: Pets around the whole of UK are being stolen. There is a petition calling for changes to the law in England and Wales, scotland has no similar petition and I would like to start one to lobby the government to Include Scotland in changing the law surrounding Pet Theft. Help by signing my petition.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
